item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 4, 2024 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Scientists glue two proteins together, driving cancer cells to self-destruct (306 points | 80 comments)
2. An embarrassingly simple approach to recover unlearned knowledge for LLMs (109 points | 29 comments)
3. I've had a change of heart regarding employee metrics (201 points | 99 comments)

8. Touchscreens are out, and tactile controls are back (934 points | 646 comments)

25. The Submerged Nabataean Temple in Puteoli at Pozzuoli, Italy (43 points | 10 comments)
26. GJS: Node.js Like Runtime for Gnome (26 points | 3 comments)
27. Show HN: Tinder, but to Decide What to Eat (155 points | 133 comments)
28. Ritonavir Form III: A Coincidental Concurrent Discovery (7 points | 1 comment)
29. Top discoveries about ancient people from DNA in 2023 (57 points | 3 comments)
30. Cannot Measure Productivity (7 points | discuss)
